CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS app multiple managed accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple managed accounts to access company information through Teams iOS app, with Outlook to follow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Multiple managed accounts (Suite)
OldVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple company accounts to access company information through Teams and OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
OldVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for learner record sync (LRS)
OldVersion.description: Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Viva Connections cards in Microsoft 365 Copilots
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot brings Viva Connections cards to conversations. When a card is relevant for a specific topic, the card will surface in the conversation chat and users will be able to interact with it directly from Microsoft 365 Copilot without interrupting the user's flow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
OldVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Chat, Copilot, Notes, panes can be popped out from the meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When you are in meetings or calls, you will be able to pop out, drag, and resize your meeting panes from the meeting window. This includes Chat, Copilot, and Notes side panes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Stream Custom Agent and Bot Responses
CurrentVersion.description: Custom engine agents and Teams bots can now stream responses like Microsoft Copilot. They can provide real-time updates on their actions while delivering parts of the response as they generate it, making interactions feel faster and more engaging.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Stream Custom Agent and Bot Responses
OldVersion.description: Custom engine agents and Teams bots can now stream responses like Microsoft Copilot. They can provide real-time updates on their actions while delivering parts of the response as they generate it, making interactions feel faster and more engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Team guidance
CurrentVersion.description: With team guidance in Places, managers communicate which days their team should plan to be in the office and what the priorities are for each in-office day. Providing a purpose for team days in the office gives you another reason to come into the office.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Team guidance
OldVersion.description: With team guidance in Places, managers communicate which days their team should plan to be in the office and what the priorities are for each in-office day. Providing a purpose for team days in the office gives you another reason to come into the office.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent suggestions will appear in the Places card in calendar and the Places people tab when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to ‘Office’ when needed for in-person events.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Intelligent suggestions in calendar
OldVersion.description: Intelligent suggestions will appear in the Places card in calendar and the Places people tab when users have actions to complete to organize their day. Users will be prompted to "quick book" rooms for in-person meetings and desks for in-office days. They will also see recommendations to update their work location to ‘Office’ when needed for in-person events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls now available in GCC-High
OldVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in GCC-High (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC-High organization with the familiar Teams app you use for meetings using town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, green room, the ability to manage what attendees see, RTMP-in, live translated captions, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Discover, acquire, and manage agents through in-app store in Word and PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot extensibility, users can discover, acquire, and manage agents through the unified store. We are excited to introduce the Microsoft 365 unified store to Office documents, enabling users to discover, acquire, and manage agents directly within the in-app store for Word and PowerPoint, with Excel support coming soon.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection for the GCC environment is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). For users signed in with a Microsoft Entra account, Copilot offers enterprise data protection (EDP) and a simplified, ad-free user interface designed for work, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements. This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft Copilot general availability for GCC
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection for the GCC environment is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 GCC users who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required).  The general availability of this release will be delivered to the users with web grounding OFF by default to meet US Government requirements.  This will help protect sensitive information which should not leave the GCC compliance boundary.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/copilot/overview

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
CurrentVersion.description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-Time Mic Volume Indicator for Teams Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing the Mic Volume Indicator for Teams meetings, a feature designed to provide real-time visual feedback on your audio levels. Positioned on the user bar, this indicator ensures your voice is captured correctly, eliminating the need to ask, “Can you hear me?” By offering continuous visual confirmation, it enhances user confidence and reduces communication breakdowns. It l streamlines meeting efficiency by minimizing interruptions and ensuring seamless communication.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
CurrentVersion.description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Apply sensitivity labels with user-defined permissions in Office for the web in Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Office for the web in Microsoft 365 supports the application of sensitivity labels with user-defined permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS app multiple managed accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Allows people to use a single device with multiple managed accounts to access company information through Teams iOS app, with Outlook to follow.
